1.png.description: The pile of 3 stones is visible and slightly to the left. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 stones is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will help center the object in the frame.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 stones is clearly visible, centered, and occupies a significant portion of the image. It is extremely close, with fine surface texture and shadows visible, meeting all criteria for reaching the destination.
